snippet: A 1954 Mercedes-Benz W196 grand prix car raced by the world champion Juan Manuel Fangio of Argentina will be auctioned on Friday in Britain and could set a record for an automobile sold at auction.
abstract: Model 1954 Mercedes-Benz W196 grand prix car raced by five-time world champion Juan Manuel Fangio of Argentina will go on auction block at Goodwood Festival of Speed in Britain; some speculate car may bring sale price of $20 million, record for automobile sold at auction.
lead_paragraph: A 1954 Mercedes-Benz W196 grand prix car raced by the world champion Juan Manuel Fangio of Argentina will be auctioned on Friday in Britain and could set a record for an automobile sold at auction.

headline.print_headline: A Singular Mercedes Aims for Another Record
headline.main: A Singular Mercedes Aims for Another Record
